pkgmetadata.longdescription:
litterbox is a TLS-only IRC logger. It logs events from IRC in a SQLite database, indexing messages for full-text search. It is intended for use with the IRC bouncer net-irc/pounce, but can also be used independently as a logging bot.
litterbox provides the scoop command-line query utility. A web interface for litterbox is provided by scooper. Some formats of plain text logs can be imported into the litterbox database with unscoop.
